**Dual-Sided Design:**
Experience the unique benefits of both soft and stiff bristles in a single brush. The soft bristles are perfect for gentle cleansing and nurturing your skin, while the stiff bristles offer a thorough exfoliation that helps remove dead skin cells and improve skin texture.

**Enhanced Grip and Storage:**
The non-slip rubber patch ensures the shower brush remains firmly in your hand during use, reducing the risk of dropping. The hanging rope allows for convenient storage, keeping your shower brush hygienic and ready for your next use.

**Maintenance Recommendations:**
To ensure your Metene Shower Brush continues to perform optimally, it is recommended to replace the brush every 3-6 months and clean it every few weeks. Regular maintenance helps prevent bacteria buildup and maintains the effectiveness of the brush.

**Usage Options:**
The Metene Shower Brush is versatile and can be used both wet and dry, providing flexibility for different cleansing needs.
